item.title: Writing an embedded display driver in Rust
item.description: A year or so ago when I started my yourney into embedded development (to build a PID controller for my coffee machine) I bought a 1.5 inch RGB OLED display, which uses a SSD1351 controller. I got lucky, because a display driver for it already existed. Unfortunately, very recently it stopped working and I’m not sure why. Okay, maybe I tightened those screws a bit too much. Anyways, since I did not need a color display, I bought a very similar 1.
